name: Eldur: A Brush with Death
description:
"The time to defend your colony has come soldier! Armagana has deployed its drones to the city center. Get your power-suit ready and your hail cannon loaded, you're dropping in five."

Description

Eldur: A Brush with Death is a first-person shooter made for LOWREZJAM 2020. Your goal is to get to the city's central drain without being mauled to death by Armagana's drone creatures. This game was developed in about 40 hours by a single developer.
